channel.title: Help with RSC Landscape editor
channel.description:
I just started using the landscape editor, and set up edgeville the way I would like it, then when I signed in, I noticed that it didn't actually delete the walls for the bank and all, but rather made then transparent, making it so I couldn't walk through them. How would I delete the walls completely? I'll post a short vid of what I mean. http://imageshack.us/clip/my-videos/809/4n9.mp4/
[size=24pt][b]FIXED, THANKS.[/b][/size]

item.title: Help with RSC Landscape editor
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

[quote=“Kryptix, post:2, topic:419555”]The landscape file. It needs to know where the walls are because if it was only client-sided then the player could modify the client to walk through walls, over water, etc.

The landscape file must be updated within the server config AND the client config.[/quote]
Oh shucks me… lol Thanks
But sadly I can still see the building :’( Oh well.
Edit: Darnz… Tried to rep you lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with RSC Landscape editor
item.dc:creator: @Im_Mad_1337 Im_Mad_1337
item.description:
@Im_Mad_1337 wrote:

Did you put it on the server side too?

Oh? I’m sorry, I’m quite new to rsc, what would I have to change server sided?

Read full topic
